text: Responsible drivers are far from few nowadays
The green is my lane of travel. His lane of travel is the red  supposedly right turn only however when I was turning right he drove straight into me and collided into my right rear.

So yup.. cos my dash cam wasnâ€™t able to capture  unsure if he will turn the story around. However he did admit liability in person saying he went straight after he was confused by the lane marking perhaps due to the downpour. Nonetheless itâ€™s over.. just hope things get past. Not trying to implicate things.
Always good practice to pull out a paper and pen when taking details and just get a basic statement admitting fault
Protects you in the case there's any dashcam issues
And good in case they decide to go for direct settlement instead of insurance too
Ya. Too bad we were in a middle of a major cross junction & it was pouring quite heavily. Stupid me decided to rely on my dashcam..
Good sign to upgrade to better dashcam
But thanks for the tip! I guess itâ€™s a learning experience :-)
Wanted to get it replaced today but they couldnâ€™t do the mobile one today as they were fully booked.
Always good to invest on dashcam  spare tyre hydraulic jack/sealant+air pump etc.
Stuff you won't really use but would regret not having when you need it the most
Try filing a police report. They can extract footages since cctvs are everywhere now

Yes. Iâ€™ve requested for footage from the shell just in front of the cross junction. Hopefully the management will grant me access to the footage. Iâ€™ll look and see if there needs to be further action taken from here since I arenâ€™t able to get any footage. Hopefully I donâ€™t have to resort to legal actions as itâ€™s honestly just a small incident and we all make mistakes as humans. But thanks for all of your valuable input and advices  I truly appreciate it.

I had a similar experience. I was going the same way you were in green but a driver turned right into my car when she is supposed to be going straight only thinking I was going to turn right (i was not signalling). I still asked if she was ok or not and she was shaken  saying sorry and all. I wondered afterwards why my insurance claim was taking so long and my insurer told me they asked for 50:50 because she submitted a statement saying I was speeding on the other lane and I came out of nowhere. I told them I was not going to waste any more time on this and will get my lawyer involved. 100% almost immediately after.
There are spin doctors so statements immediately are useful  if you can get one.
Thanks for sharing. Yup  a lot of actors and actresses nowadays who donâ€™t conform to their lanes properly  but when it comes to taking responsibility  all of a sudden itâ€™s everyoneâ€™s fault.
